objects.name: Analytic 0138
objects.description: Malicious Office add-ins loaded via VSTO, COM, or VBA auto-load paths. Upon launch of Word/Excel/Outlook, the add-in executes code without user action. Add-in resides in trusted directory or registered via Office COM/VBE subsystem. Behavior includes unsigned add-in execution, anomalous load context, or add-in spawning interpreter process.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: WinEventLog:Application
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Office Add-in load errors, abnormal loading context, or unsigned add-in warnings

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: WinEventLog:Microsoft-Office/OutlookAddinMonitor
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Outlook loading add-in via unexpected load path or non-default profile context

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Admins may allow or block unsigned add-ins depending on GPO configuration
Different Office versions store trusted paths and add-in configs in version-specific locations
Some add-ins only load on specific actions (new document, open file, etc.)
